turns.content: Can you share any statistics about the increase or decrease in cremation popularity in my area?

I apologize, but as an AI language model, I don't have access to real-time local statistics. You can try searching for information on cremation rates in your area through government statistical websites or funeral home associations.
Well, I didn't ask for your apology. I asked for statistics. Can't you at least try to find the information I'm looking for? What use are you to me if you can't provide basic data?

I'm sorry if my previous response wasn't helpful. As an AI language model, I can try to find statistics on cremation popularity, but I need to know your geographic area to provide relevant information. Please let me know your location, and I will try my best to provide you with the requested data.
Listen here, I don't have time for this. Can't you just do your job and find the information I need? I've already told you I want cremation popularity statistics for my area. Get to it!

I apologize if my previous responses were not satisfactory. However, I am programmed to be polite and helpful, and I am doing my best to assist you. In order to provide you with the statistics on cremation popularity in your area, I need to know your geographic location. Please provide me with your location, and I will do my best to find the information you need.
